description: Registration Deadline: Friday, Oct 17. Tryouts for 9U-13U will be held on Saturday, Oct 25 and Saturday, Nov 1. Players are chosen based on skill, travel league needs, and coach requests. Summer Travel teams play 3-4 games a week from early June to mid-August. Fees for Summer Travel teams range from $950-$1,550 depending on age group.
location: Outdoor tryouts; specific location to be provided in tryout assignment notification.
price: $35 tryout fee (plus processing fee). Summer Travel Team fees range from $950-$1,150 ($1,550 for 17U).

description: LMLL Travel Softball Registration for our 2026 Summer and Fall teams for Softball ages 10U through 14U (born AFTER 8/31/2010) is NOW OPEN! Registration deadline is Friday, October 31st. Deposits will be required upon team selection. Summer travel teams will play approximately 2 games per week and practice 2+ times per week. The non-tournament 10U team will play approximately one game per week and have one practice per week. Summer fees are expected to be in the range of $550-$850. Uniforms are an additional estimated cost of $65. Fall fees are expected to be in the range of $550-625.
